item.title: 特朗普美联储解雇案裁决预计要到9月4日提交申请后才会做出
item.description: 华盛顿的一名联邦法官可能不会在9月4日之前就唐纳德-特朗普总统罢免美联储理事丽莎-库克一案做出裁决，因为他给了政府更多的时间来提交该案的论据。【原文：A federal judge in Washington likely won’t rule before Sept. 4 in the fight over President Donald Trump’s move to oust Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook after giving the government more time to submit arguments in the case.】

item.title: 魁北克政府终止对 Northvolt 电池项目的资助
item.description: 魁北克政府已退出 Northvolt AB 加拿大电动汽车电池厂，结束了因该公司破产而脱轨的备受瞩目的项目。【原文：The Quebec government has walked away from Northvolt AB’s Canadian electric vehicle battery plant, closing the chapter on a high-profile project derailed by the company’s bankruptcy.】

item.title: 银行家准备迎接美国 IPO 热潮中最繁忙的一周
item.description: 尽管 9 月份的股市声名狼藉，但各家公司仍急于利用近期市场对美国新股上市的热情。【原文：Companies are rushing to take advantage of recent market enthusiasm for new US listings despite September’s reputation as a tough month for stocks.】

item.title: 苹果公司机器人技术首席人工智能研究员转投 Meta 公司，成为其最新离职计划的一部分
item.description: 苹果公司负责机器人技术的首席人工智能研究员已经离职，加入了 Meta Platforms 公司的竞争团队，这也是这家 iPhone 制造商人工智能人才外流的一部分。【原文：Apple Inc.’s lead artificial intelligence researcher for robotics has departed the company to join Meta Platforms Inc.’s competing effort, part of an exodus of AI talent from the iPhone maker.】

item.title: 2025 年住宅 ETF 流入量以二比一的比例超过共同基金
item.description: 与专注于该资产类别的传统共同基金相比，市政债券交易所交易基金今年吸引的现金量增加了一倍多，这凸显出 ETF 作为该领域的投资工具越来越受欢迎。【原文：Municipal bond exchange-traded funds drew more than double the amount of cash this year compared to traditional mutual funds focused on the asset class, highlighting the growing popularity of ETFs as an investment vehicle in the space.】

item.title: 如果美联储降息，柴油涨势将延续至秋季
item.description: 分析师说，如果美联储本月降息，柴油的夏季涨势可能会延续到秋季，从而推动以这种主力燃料为动力的工业活动。【原文：Diesel’s summer rally may extend into the fall if the Fed cuts interest rates this month, bolstering industrial activity powered by the workhorse fuel, analysts say.】

item.title: OpenAI 将以 11 亿美元收购产品测试初创公司 Statsig
item.description: OpenAI 同意以 11 亿美元的价格收购产品测试初创公司 Statsig，该公司表示，这是 ChatGPT 制造商历史上最大的收购案之一。【原文：OpenAI has agreed to buy product testing startup Statsig for $1.1 billion in an all-stock deal, the company said, marking one of the largest acquisitions in the ChatGPT maker’s history.】

item.title: 特朗普将审查马萨诸塞州海上风电场的批准情况
item.description: 特朗普政府计划重新考虑颁发给马萨诸塞州沿海一个大型风力发电场的许可证，这是其针对清洁能源资源的最新行动。【原文：The Trump administration plans to reconsider a permit issued to a large wind farm off the coast of Massachusetts, the latest move in its targeted campaign against the clean energy resource.】

item.title: 摩根大通修订 2025 年垃圾货币利差、收益率和回报率目标
item.description: 强劲而有韧性的基本面、旺盛的需求、有限的新增供应以及对美国最早将于本月降息的预期，都促使摩根大通修订了其对 2025 年垃圾债券利差、收益率、回报率和供应量的目标。【原文：Strong and resilient fundamentals, robust demand, limited new supply amid expectations of a US rate cut as early as this month have all led JPMorgan to revise its target for spreads on junk bonds, their yield, returns and supply for 2025.】

item.title: 美联储逆回购机制使用量跌至 2021 年以来新低
item.description: 随着投资者和银行在本月底之后将资金重新投入工作，作为投资组合再平衡的一部分，对美联储一项主要机制的需求降至四年多来的最低水平。【原文：Demand for a major Federal Reserve facility dropped to the lowest level in more than four years as investors and banks put money back to work as part of portfolio rebalancing after the end of the month.】

item.title: 法国推动欧盟领导人参与制定 2040 年气候目标
item.description: 法国正在推动将有关欧盟下一个气候目标的讨论提升到领导人层面，这为有关过渡速度和方向的冲突埋下了伏笔。【原文：France is pushing to elevate discussions on the European Union’s next climate goal to the leaders’ level, setting the stage for a clash over the speed and direction of the transition.】

item.title: 安巴尼的信实集团计划进行 20 亿美元的资产支持证券交易
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，亿万富翁穆克什-安巴尼（Mukesh Ambani）的信实集团正计划通过资产支持证券融资约 1,800 亿卢比（约合 20 亿美元），这可能是印度今年最大的此类交易之一。【原文：Billionaire Mukesh Ambani’s Reliance Group is planning to raise about 180 billion rupees ($2 billion) through asset-backed securities, according to people familiar with the matter, in what could be one of the largest such deals in India this year.】

item.title: 尽管资金宽松，高盛仍预计储备金将低于 3 万亿美元
item.description: 据高盛公司（Goldman Sachs & Co.【原文：A torrent of US Treasury bill issuance in August is likely to ease this month, relieving pressures on funding markets, but won’t be enough to prevent a gradual slide in bank reserves below $3 trillion by the end of the quarter, according to Goldman Sachs & Co.】

item.title: 荷兰保险公司 Aegon 出让 6% 的 ASR 股份，专注于美国市场
item.description: 荷兰保险公司 Aegon Ltd. 正寻求出售收购其国内业务的 ASR Nederland NV 公司 6% 的股份，因为该公司正将业务重点转向美国。【原文：Dutch insurer Aegon Ltd. is looking to sell a 6% stake in ASR Nederland NV, the firm that bought its domestic operations, as it shifts its focus to the US.】

item.title: 抗议降温，普拉博沃继续中国之行
item.description: 印尼总统普拉博沃-苏比安托已启程前往中国，这是他最初因震惊东南亚国家的长达一周的抗议活动而取消的行程。【原文：Indonesian President Prabowo Subianto has departed for China, pushing through with a trip he had initially scrapped due to the weeklong protests that have rocked the Southeast Asian nation.】

item.title: 到 2030 年，全球企业在南非的业务将增长 45
item.description: 到本十年末，全球公司将大幅扩大或在南非建立业务，以利用南非的人才库。【原文：Global companies are set to significantly expand or set up operations in South Africa by the end of the decade to access its talent pool.】

item.title: 芝加哥学校计划在预算投票出现分歧后首次出售债券
item.description: 芝加哥被评为垃圾级的公立学区打算在下周出售一笔金额未公开的债券，用于基本建设项目，这是该学区在董事会通过一项有争议的预算几天后首次提出新的债务计划。【原文：Chicago’s junk-rated public school district intends to sell an undisclosed amount of bonds next week for capital projects, laying out its first plans for new debt days after the board passed a controversial budget.】

item.title: 英伟达 3,400 亿美元巨亏拖累股价跌破关键技术位
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）的收盘价有望自 5 月份以来首次跌破关键技术位，原因是投资者继续轮番撤出这家领先的人工智能芯片制造商。【原文：Nvidia Corp. is on track for its first close below a key technical level since May as investors continue to rotate out of the leading maker of artificial intelligence chips.】

item.title: 高盛的英格拉西亚认为 2026 年并购交易量有可能创下新高
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Dealmaking could hit record volumes in 2026 if market conditions continue to improve and free up a backlog of transactions, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s co-chair of global mergers and acquisitions.】

item.title: 据说油轮制造商 KNDS 将为可能的双重上市筛选顾问
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，为乌克兰战争提供机械设备的法德坦克制造商KNDS NV公司正在寻找财务顾问，以帮助安排潜在的首次公开募股，同时加紧上市准备工作。【原文：Franco-German tankmaker KNDS NV, which supplies machinery used in the war in Ukraine, is sounding out financial advisers to help arrange a potential initial public offering as it steps up preparations for a listing, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧洲央行穆勒称维持利率和观察经济是明智之举
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员马迪斯-穆勒（Madis Muller）表示，下周欧洲中央银行有能力保持利率稳定，因为通胀率徘徊在目标附近，经济显示出韧性。【原文：The European Central Bank can afford to keep interest rates steady next week as inflation hovers close to its target and the economy shows resilience, Governing Council member Madis Muller said.】

item.title: Anthropic 完成新一轮融资，估值达 1,830 亿美元
item.description: Anthropic公司在新一轮融资中完成了向投资者融资130亿美元的交易，包括融资金额在内，其估值几乎翻了三番，达到1 830亿美元；这一超预期的融资额使这家人工智能公司成为全球最有价值的初创企业之一。【原文：Anthropic has closed a deal to raise $13 billion from investors in a new funding round that nearly triples its valuation to $183 billion, including dollars raised — a larger-than-expected haul that makes the artificial intelligence company one of the most valuable startups in the world.】

item.title: 沃伦-巴菲特说他对卡夫亨氏的解体感到失望
item.description: 沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）表示，他对卡夫亨氏公司（Kraft Heinz Co.【原文：Warren Buffett said he’s disappointed in the planned split of Kraft Heinz Co., though he concedes the merger he orchestrated a decade ago wasn’t a brilliant idea.】

item.title: 印度在世贸组织质疑美国对部分铜进口征收高额关税
item.description: 印度周二在世界贸易组织对美国对部分铜产品征收关税提出质疑，称这一高额征税对南亚国家的出口商造成了贸易限制。【原文：India on Tuesday challenged US tariffs on some copper products at the World Trade Organization, calling the high levies trade restrictions that impact the South Asian country’s exporters.】

item.title: 伍德赛德能源公司首席执行官淡化中俄管道交易带来的液化天然气风险
item.description: 在俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（Gazprom PJSC）宣布正在建设通往中国的 "西伯利亚力量2号"（Power of Siberia 2）天然气管道之后，伍德赛德能源公司（Woodside Energy）消除了亚洲对液化天然气需求减弱的担忧。【原文：Woodside Energy shrugged off concerns that liquefied natural gas demand in Asia would ebb following the announcement that Russia’s Gazprom PJSC is building the Power of Siberia 2 gas pipeline to China.】

item.title: 节后获利回吐导致美国玉米、大豆和小麦价格下跌
item.description: 周二，谷物和油籽期货下跌，原因是美国劳动节假期结束后市场重新开盘，获利了结帮助削减了上周五的涨幅。【原文：Grain and oilseed futures fell Tuesday amid profit taking that helped pare back Friday’s gains as the market reopened from the US Labor Day holiday.】

item.title: 俄罗斯银行警告预算压力将迫使削减开支
item.description: 俄罗斯央行表示，由于预算缺口有可能超过官方计划，且储备持续减少，俄罗斯最终将需要削减部分开支。【原文：Russia will eventually need to cut some spending as a budget gap threatens to surpass official plans and reserves continue to dwindle, the central bank said.】

item.title: 王丹世界观获胜
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 派拉蒙将根据《使命召唤》游戏系列制作电影
item.description: 派拉蒙 Skydance 公司周二发表声明说，该公司已与微软公司的动视视频游戏部门达成协议，将开发和制作一部以《使命召唤》系列为题材的真人电影。【原文：Paramount Skydance Corp. has struck a deal with Microsoft Corp.’s Activision video-game unit to develop and produce a live-action film based on the Call of Duty franchise, the company said in a statement Tuesday.】

item.title: 欧洲单日债券销售额达到创纪录的 496 亿欧元
item.description: 随着英国和意大利推出巨额交易，欧洲债券市场的发行量将创下历史新高，在经历了夏季的冷清之后，九月的融资热潮将由此拉开序幕。【原文：Europe’s bond market is set to notch a record day of issuance as the UK and Italy offered jumbo deals, kickstarting a September rush for funding after a summer lull.】
